Title: Episode #1.2
Writer: Steven Knight (created by), Tom Hardy (created by), Chips Hardy (created by), Steven Knight
Actors: Richard Dixon, Jonathan Pryce, Tom Hardy, David Hayman
Plot: Despite Delaney's return to London setting tongues wagging, he enlists allies in his quest to reclaim his legacy, while an unexpected arrival at the reading of the will disrupts his plans and reveals the nature of his inheritance.
